input: user: A young girl reading a book under a large oak tree, sunlight filtering through the leaves onto the pages. The scene is peaceful and imaginative.

The background showcases soft grass and distant wildflowers, enhancing the tranquil atmosphere. This image should evoke a sense of peace and imaginative wonder, inviting viewers into her enchanting world of stories.
